name: Bullish Engulfing Momentum Swing
description: Long-only daily swing strategy that trades highly liquid U.S. large-cap equities. It enters when a Bullish Engulfing pattern forms on ≥130 % 30-day average volume and RSI(14) > 55. Exits on Bearish Engulfing, RSI < 48, 10-day time stop, 4.5 % target or 2.2 % stop-loss (OCO). Allocates 2 % equity per trade to maintain a moderate risk profile.
